name: Advanced Runner's Warmup
description: A comprehensive warmup for experienced runners

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand with feet together, arms at sides, then jump while spreading legs and raising arms
exercises.audioInstructions: Do jumping jacks for 45 seconds to warm up your entire body

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, lifting your knees as high as possible with each step
exercises.audioInstructions: Do high knees for 40 seconds to activate your hip flexors
exercises.halfwayAudioCue: 20 seconds left, keep those knees up!

exercises.name: Leg Swings
exercises.description: Hold onto something stable and swing one leg forward and backward, then side to side
exercises.audioInstructions: Perform leg swings to loosen up your hips and legs. 30 seconds per leg

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge position, alternating legs
exercises.audioInstructions: Do dynamic walking lunges to activate your glutes and hamstrings

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Extend arms to sides and make small circles, then larger ones
exercises.audioInstructions: Make arm circles to warm up your shoulders and upper body

exercises.name: Dynamic Stretches
exercises.description: Perform a series of dynamic stretches for the major muscle groups
exercises.audioInstructions: Perform dynamic stretches to increase flexibility and range of motion
exercises.halfwayAudioCue: Halfway there, switch to the next stretch

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Run in place, kicking your heels up toward your buttocks
exercises.audioInstructions: Do butt kicks to warm up your quadriceps and hamstrings

name: Quick Warmup
description: A short warmup for when you're pressed for time

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand with feet together, arms at sides, then jump while spreading legs and raising arms
exercises.audioInstructions: Quick jumping jacks to get your heart rate up

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, lifting your knees as high as possible with each step
exercises.audioInstructions: High knees for 20 seconds, fast pace!

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge position, alternating legs
exercises.audioInstructions: Quick walking lunges to activate your legs
